scripts.updateBulidCode: npm run updateCode & npm run bulidCode
scripts.publish:redis:mysql: npm run publish:redis & npm run publish:mysql
scripts.publish:all:prod: cross-env type=publish_all       NODE_ENV=production node ./bin/publish -r dotenv/config  dotenv_config_path=.env.production
scripts.publish:server:prod: cross-env type=publish_server NODE_ENV=production node ./bin/publish -r dotenv/config  dotenv_config_path=.env.production
scripts.publish:client:prod: cross-env type=publish_client NODE_ENV=production node ./bin/publish -r dotenv/config  dotenv_config_path=.env.production
scripts.publish:admin:prod: cross-env type=publish_admin   NODE_ENV=production node ./bin/publish -r dotenv/config  dotenv_config_path=.env.production
scripts.publish:entry:prod: cross-env type=publish_entry   NODE_ENV=production node ./bin/publish -r dotenv/config  dotenv_config_path=.env.production
scripts.publish:all:dev: cross-env type=publish_all       NODE_ENV=development node ./bin/publish -r  dotenv/config  dotenv_config_path=.env.development
scripts.publish:server:dev: cross-env type=publish_server NODE_ENV=development node ./bin/publish -r  dotenv/config  dotenv_config_path=.env.development
scripts.publish:client:dev: cross-env type=publish_client NODE_ENV=development node ./bin/publish -r  dotenv/config  dotenv_config_path=.env.development
scripts.publish:admin:dev: cross-env type=publish_admin   NODE_ENV=development node ./bin/publish -r  dotenv/config  dotenv_config_path=.env.development
scripts.publish:entry:dev: cross-env type=publish_entry   NODE_ENV=development node ./bin/publish -r  dotenv/config  dotenv_config_path=.env.development
